name: Larry
description: I’m Christian, conservative, vegetarian but don’t care what you eat. I’m not judgmental, respect and sensitive to other people’s feelings. I like watching action, movie, thrillers, horror, comedies and drama. Music: Three Doors Down, Nickel Back, Foo Fighters, Three Days Grace “modern rock”, classical, blue grass, jazz and a little R & B. I’m always looking to better my health. I love animals and enjoy the beauty of nature. I enjoy playing with my dog and son. I’m a open person, honest, caring and would like to spend time with a single woman to share my feelings and affections with. I like playing games with but would enjoy just eating dinner, watching a movie and spending time with you alone. I’m easy to please and enjoy the simple things in life.
